comments.author: virasog
comments.body: True, there are no boundaries for bitcoin. You can send and receive bitcoin anywhere in the world and there will be no restrictions, no extra fees (other than the usual transaction fee).Â  Bitcoin is something that mankind needed to solve many issues which arise when it comes to cross border payments etc. Bitcoin BTC addresses all of these issues but only thing is that we need to make bitcoin, the true medium of exchange and not limit it to the store of value.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: Bitcoin has no boundaries... It has no color, language, religion or nationality. Laughing and crying have no color, religion, language or nationality. Therefore, we may accept it as a being close to us. We have to thank Satoshi once again for keeping Bitcoin out of everything. He left us a divine gift like gold and silver, sun and moon...By the way, the message in the tweet has the flag of my country, but there is no abbreviation of my country in the message here. mine is here: tr

comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 07, 2022, 02:06:24 PM Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡«Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡°Â Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡·Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡º Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¦Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¬ Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡³Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡®Â Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡´ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡²Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡² Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡³ Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡©Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¹Â Â  Â  ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡½ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡ºÂ Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡®Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡´ğŸ‡²Bitcoin is borderless and marginless;Bitcoin is for all;Bitcoin is not a racist and neither does it gender discriminate; Bitcoin is liberty and freedom;But some of the rich countries believe they don't need bitcoin;They see bitcoin as a threat and an enemy to their dying fiat.Yet, some poor countries like El Salvador has taken their spot;O ye bitcoin, be not weary;The end shall justify the means.Bitcoin will be vindicated;Bitcoin would be recognised;Upon the foundation of bitcoin will the new world finance system be built.

comments.author: Balmain
comments.body: Bitcoin is universal yes, and as the years go by, more and more people will adopt this technology. Against the prohibitions of all central systems it is truly unlimited and unavoidable. Bitcoin is for all of us. Most importantly, it represents freedom. It's not just a coin, it has a great philosophy underneath it. People see it only as a coin, but this is temporary, of course, one day, he will see the places he really needs to see in the other part.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Therefore bitcoin is the only global currency, not controlled by any government or country.bitcoin belongs to everyone and even the whole world can use it without knowing anyone and can also send and receive bitcoins from all countries without limits.Bitcoin has no limits, but the number of bitcoins is limited and this is the beauty and uniqueness of Bitcoin so that there is no limit that makes Bitcoin continue to grow and develop from several countries and even all countries.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Above all, bitcoin is the best alternative to bank notes as there is limitations with bank notes n certain occasion, but with Bitcoin, one can become border less and can connect to the blockchain anytime anywhere without regional restrictions. I love this concept bit just that am not cool with too much colors but then you gat quite a good collection of colors amin respect to various countries flags and colors that symbolize unity and gradual adoption and penetration into the system .

comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 07, 2022, 02:06:24 PM Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡«Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡°Â Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡·Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡º Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¦Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¬ Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡³Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡®Â Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡´ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡²Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡² Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡³ Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡©Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¹Â Â  Â  ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡½ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡ºÂ Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡®Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡´ğŸ‡²-Please feel free to comment if your country is not part of the bitcoin logo. -Also add your country flag in your comment, let's have fun doing it ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š, -Here is mine Â ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¬Inspired by: @MMCryptoBitcoin is freedom and truly borderless. I could remember how I lost one thousand Canadian dollar because of a means of sending it across. The sender was a friend on Facebook and we've been friends for over 6 months and one day I really needed help which he offered to render but had to use ria money transfer to send the money and after sending the money, the riamoney agent told him the transaction would take just 15 minutes for reflection and ignorantly I didn't get to check because it was a Saturday and banks don't open here on Saturdays so I felt it should have reflected by Monday. Got to the bank to get the money but it wasn't available yet because it actually takes 3 to 5 working days for reflection. I asked him to go back and get the money and then send it using a Bitcoin machine, only for him to get there and was discouraged by the ria agent and I lost that money and got evicted from my apartment. Bitcoin has faced so many challenges similar to this and even worst but Bitcoin remains borderless since it's decentralized and no one can stop Bitcoin even in countries it has been prohibited.

comments.author: Marvell1
comments.body: Yes, bitcoin has no borders. This reminds me of march, april this year, when the war between Russia and Ukraine started, a lot of people used bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies to donate to Ukraine, if there is no bitcoin in that case i think people who want to support ukraine will have no way to transfer money to donate to Ukraine. In this case, obviously fiat can't do that because if you donate via bank then things will be very complicated and there is no guarantee that the ukraines will receive the donation via fiat. As long as we have the internet and smartphones, we can transfer money to anywhere in the world with just a few minutes of confirmation that no traditional asset can do, can only be bitcoin.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on October 08, 2022, 03:07:07 AMYes, bitcoin has no borders. This reminds me of march, april this year, when the war between Russia and Ukraine started, a lot of people used bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies to donate to Ukraine, if there is no bitcoin in that case i think people who want to support ukraine will have no way to transfer money to donate to Ukraine. In this case, obviously fiat can't do that because if you donate via bank then things will be very complicated and there is no guarantee that the ukraines will receive the donation via fiat. As long as we have the internet and smartphones, we can transfer money to anywhere in the world with just a few minutes of confirmation that no traditional asset can do, can only be bitcoin.there is no limit to bitcoin for anyone and transactions only require transaction fees when you want to send money.i have some friends from italy and germany they want to donate a little money when in my country there is a natural disaster. but they are both confused to send their money from the bank later it will be too much cost and not as easy as sending bitcoin process.and i try to tell them how to send bitcoin is one quick and easy way to send money to help people in my country

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Bitcoin is complete without restrictions and can pass through all countries freely. You don't have to exchange currency in another country if that country accepts bitcoin payments. And more importantly, the transaction fees are also lower than using other methods and can arrive in a short time. But unfortunately, not all governments have approved the use of bitcoin as payment, so we as bitcoin users, are not free to use it yet. But some countries already allow users to use bitcoin as an investment tool, and each user's responsibility is the risk.
